name: Beacon Summer 1991
description: Join us for an epic LAN party at Beacon Summer 2025! Experience non-stop gaming, thrilling tournaments, cosplay contests, tech workshops, and delicious food. Connect with fellow gamers, win exciting prizes, and create unforgettable memories in this action-packed event.

rules.text: Submissions must not use copyrighted material without explicit rights or licenses.
Kreacon may use and publish submissions on their websites/newsletters with appropriate attribution and links.
The 'General Rules' apply to all competition categories.
Maximum runtime is 7 minutes.
The maximum file size for uncompressed entry files is 64 MB, including readmes, etc. You may use any compression algorithm for parts of your contribution.
Raw animations are not allowed. Animations should be submitted to the Wild / Animation competition.

Your contribution must be free of third-party rights unless you have a legal license to use the content. Free software or third-party content may be used if the license permits. You may use third-party content not under such a license if you have a signed permit from the copyright holder. This applies to everything in your contribution, including graphic engines, music, graphics, etc. We REQUIRE that you properly credit all third-party content when submitting your contribution.
A maximum of one competition entry per artist(s) is allowed.
The 'General Rules' apply to all competition categories.
Maximum runtime is 7 minutes.
The 'General Rules' apply to all competition categories.

name: Beacon Winter 1991
description: Embrace the chill at Beacon Winter 2025! Our cozy LAN party features indoor gaming marathons, frosty-themed tournaments, winter cosplay contests, tech workshops by the fireplace, and warm comfort food. Connect with fellow gamers, compete for cool prizes, and create lasting memories in this winter wonderland of gaming.
